vb18:4.1: Kati khandhā, kati āyatanāni, kati dhātuyo, kati saccāni, kati indriyāni, kati hetū, kati āhārā, kati phassā, kati vedanā, kati saññā, kati cetanā, kati cittāni?
vb18:5.1: Pañcakkhandhā, dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo, cattāri saccāni, bāvīsatindriyāni, nava hetū, cattāro āhārā, satta phassā, satta vedanā, satta saññā, satta cetanā, satta cittāni.
vb18:7.2: Cakkhāyatanaṃ, rūpāyatanaṃ, sotāyatanaṃ, saddāyatanaṃ, ghānāyatanaṃ, gandhāyatanaṃ, jivhāyatanaṃ, rasāyatanaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, manāyatanaṃ, dhammāyatanaṃ—
vb18:8.2: Cakkhudhātu, rūpadhātu, cakkhuviññāṇadhātu, sotadhātu, saddadhātu, sotaviññāṇadhātu, ghānadhātu, gandhadhātu, ghānaviññāṇadhātu, jivhādhātu, rasadhātu, jivhāviññāṇadhātu, kāyadhātu, phoṭṭhabbadhātu, kāyaviññāṇadhātu, manodhātu, dhammadhātu, manoviññāṇadhātu—
vb18:10.2: Cakkhundriyaṃ, sotindriyaṃ, ghānindriyaṃ, jivhindriyaṃ, kāyindriyaṃ, manindriyaṃ, itthindriyaṃ, purisindriyaṃ, jīvitindriyaṃ, sukhindriyaṃ, dukkhindriyaṃ, somanassindriyaṃ, domanassindriyaṃ, upekkhindriyaṃ, saddhindriyaṃ, vīriyindriyaṃ, satindriyaṃ, samādhindriyaṃ, paññindriyaṃ, anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ, aññindriyaṃ, aññātāvindriyaṃ—
vb18:11.2: Tayo kusalahetū, tayo akusalahetū, tayo abyākatahetū.
vb18:12.2: Alobho kusalahetu, adoso kusalahetu, amoho kusalahetu—
vb18:13.2: Lobho akusalahetu, doso akusalahetu, moho akusalahetu—
vb18:14.2: Kusalānaṃ vā dhammānaṃ vipākato kiriyābyākatesu vā dhammesu alobho, adoso, amoho—
vb18:16.2: Cakkhusamphasso, sotasamphasso, ghānasamphasso, jivhāsamphasso, kāyasamphasso, manodhātusamphasso, manoviññāṇadhātusamphasso—
vb18:17.2: Cakkhusamphassajā vedanā, sotasamphassajā vedanā, ghānasamphassajā vedanā, jivhāsamphassajā vedanā, kāyasamphassajā vedanā, manodhātusamphassajā vedanā, manoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā vedanā—
vb18:18.2: Cakkhusamphassajā saññā, sotasamphassajā saññā, ghānasamphassajā saññā, jivhāsamphassajā saññā, kāyasamphassajā saññā, manodhātusamphassajā saññā, manoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā saññā—
vb18:19.2: Cakkhusamphassajā cetanā, sotasamphassajā cetanā, ghānasamphassajā cetanā, jivhāsamphassajā cetanā, kāyasamphassajā cetanā, manodhātusamphassajā cetanā, manoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā cetanā—
vb18:20.2: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, sotaviññāṇaṃ, ghānaviññāṇaṃ, jivhāviññāṇaṃ, kāyaviññāṇaṃ, manodhātu, manoviññāṇadhātu—
vb18:23.1: Kāmadhātuyā kati khandhā, kati āyatanāni, kati dhātuyo, kati saccāni, kati indriyāni, kati hetū, kati āhārā, kati phassā, kati vedanā, kati saññā, kati cetanā, kati cittāni?
vb18:24.1: Kāmadhātuyā pañcakkhandhā, dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo, tīṇi saccāni, bāvīsatindriyāni, nava hetū, cattāro āhārā, satta phassā, satta vedanā, satta saññā, satta cetanā, satta cittāni.
vb18:26.2: Cakkhāyatanaṃ, rūpāyatanaṃ, sotāyatanaṃ, saddāyatanaṃ, ghānāyatanaṃ, gandhāyatanaṃ, jivhāyatanaṃ, rasāyatanaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, manāyatanaṃ, dhammāyatanaṃ—
vb18:27.2: Cakkhudhātu, rūpadhātu, cakkhuviññāṇadhātu, sotadhātu, saddadhātu, sotaviññāṇadhātu, ghānadhātu, gandhadhātu, ghānaviññāṇadhātu, jivhādhātu, rasadhātu, jivhāviññāṇadhātu, kāyadhātu, phoṭṭhabbadhātu, kāyaviññāṇadhātu, manodhātu, dhammadhātu, manoviññāṇadhātu—
vb18:30.2: Tayo kusalahetū, tayo akusalahetū, tayo abyākatahetū … pe …
vb18:32.2: Cakkhusamphasso sotasamphasso, ghānasamphasso, jivhāsamphasso, kāyasamphasso, manodhātusamphasso, manoviññāṇadhātusamphasso—
vb18:33.2: Cakkhusamphassajā vedanā, sotasamphassajā vedanā, ghānasamphassajā vedanā, jivhāsamphassajā vedanā, kāyasamphassajā vedanā, manodhātusamphassajā vedanā, manoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā vedanā—

vb18:38.1: Rūpadhātuyā kati khandhā, kati āyatanā, kati dhātuyo, kati saccāni, kati indriyāni  … pe … kati cittāni?
vb18:39.1: Rūpadhātuyā pañcakkhandhā, cha āyatanāni, nava dhātuyo, tīṇi saccāni, cuddasindriyāni, aṭṭha hetū, tayo āhārā, cattāro phassā, catasso vedanā, catasso saññā, catasso cetanā, cattāri cittāni.
vb18:41.2: Cakkhāyatanaṃ, rūpāyatanaṃ, sotāyatanaṃ, saddāyatanaṃ, manāyatanaṃ, dhammāyatanaṃ—
vb18:42.2: Cakkhudhātu, rūpadhātu, cakkhuviññāṇadhātu, sotadhātu, saddadhātu, sotaviññāṇadhātu, manodhātu, dhammadhātu, manoviññāṇadhātu—

vb18:46.2: Alobho kusalahetu, adoso kusalahetu, amoho kusalahetu—

vb18:53.1: Arūpadhātuyā kati khandhā  … pe … kati cittāni?
vb18:54.1: Arūpadhātuyā cattāro khandhā, dve āyatanāni, dve dhātuyo, tīṇi saccāni, ekādasindriyāni, aṭṭha hetū, tayo āhārā, eko phasso, ekā vedanā, ekā saññā, ekā cetanā, ekaṃ cittaṃ.
vb18:59.2: Manindriyaṃ, jīvitindriyaṃ, somanassindriyaṃ, upekkhindriyaṃ, saddhindriyaṃ, vīriyindriyaṃ, satindriyaṃ, samādhindriyaṃ, paññindriyaṃ, aññindriyaṃ, aññātāvindriyaṃ—
vb18:60.2: Tayo kusalahetū, dve akusalahetū, tayo abyākatahetū … pe …
vb18:63.1: Tattha katamā arūpadhātuyā ekā vedanā … pe …
vb18:65.1: Apariyāpanne kati khandhā  … pe … kati cittāni?
vb18:66.1: Apariyāpanne cattāro khandhā, dve āyatanāni, dve dhātuyo, dve saccāni, dvādasindriyāni, cha hetū, tayo āhārā, eko phasso, ekā vedanā, ekā saññā, ekā cetanā, ekaṃ cittaṃ.
vb18:71.2: Manindriyaṃ, jīvitindriyaṃ, somanassindriyaṃ, upekkhindriyaṃ, saddhindriyaṃ, vīriyindriyaṃ, satindriyaṃ, samādhindriyaṃ, paññindriyaṃ, anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ, aññindriyaṃ, aññātāvindriyaṃ—
vb18:73.2: Alobho kusalahetu, adoso kusalahetu, amoho kusalahetu—
vb18:74.2: Kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākato alobho, adoso, amoho—
vb18:77.1: Tattha katamā apariyāpanne ekā vedanā … pe … ekā saññā … pe … ekā cetanā … pe … ekaṃ cittaṃ?

vb18:126.1: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kati khandhā pātubhavanti  … pe … kati cittāni pātubhavanti?
vb18:128.1: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe sabbesaṃ katame pañcakkhandhā pātubhavanti?
vb18:128.5: kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe sabbesaṃ ime pañcakkhandhā pātubhavanti. #1
vb18:129.2: Kāmāvacarānaṃ devānaṃ, paṭhamakappikānaṃ manussānaṃ, opapātikānaṃ petānaṃ, opapātikānaṃ asurānaṃ, opapātikānaṃ tiracchānagatānaṃ, nerayikānaṃ paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe ekādasāyatanāni pātubhavanti—
vb18:129.3: cakkhāyatanaṃ, rūpāyatanaṃ, sotāyatanaṃ, ghānāyatanaṃ, gandhāyatanaṃ, jivhāyatanaṃ, rasāyatanaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, manāyatanaṃ, dhammāyatanaṃ.
vb18:129.4: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe etesaṃ imāni ekādasāyatanāni pātubhavanti.
vb18:130.2: Opapātikānaṃ petānaṃ, opapātikānaṃ asurānaṃ, opapātikānaṃ tiracchānagatānaṃ nerayikānaṃ, jaccandhānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe dasāyatanāni pātubhavanti—
vb18:130.3: rūpāyatanaṃ, sotāyatanaṃ, ghānāyatanaṃ, gandhāyatanaṃ, jivhāyatanaṃ, rasāyatanaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, manāyatanaṃ, dhammāyatanaṃ.
vb18:130.4: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe etesaṃ imāni dasāyatanāni pātubhavanti.
vb18:131.1: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassa aparāni dasāyatanāni pātubhavanti?
vb18:131.2: Opapātikānaṃ petānaṃ, opapātikānaṃ asurānaṃ, opapātikānaṃ tiracchānagatānaṃ nerayikānaṃ, jaccabadhirānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe dasāyatanāni pātubhavanti—
vb18:131.3: cakkhāyatanaṃ, rūpāyatanaṃ, ghānāyatanaṃ, gandhāyatanaṃ, jivhāyatanaṃ, rasāyatanaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, manāyatanaṃ, dhammāyatanaṃ.
vb18:131.4: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe etesaṃ imāni dasāyatanāni pātubhavanti.
vb18:132.2: Opapātikānaṃ petānaṃ, opapātikānaṃ asurānaṃ, opapātikānaṃ tiracchānagatānaṃ nerayikānaṃ, jaccandhabadhirānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe navāyatanāni pātubhavanti—
vb18:132.3: rūpāyatanaṃ, ghānāyatanaṃ, gandhāyatanaṃ, jivhāyatanaṃ, rasāyatanaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, manāyatanaṃ, dhammāyatanaṃ.
vb18:132.4: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe etesaṃ imāni navāyatanāni pātubhavanti.
vb18:133.3: rūpāyatanaṃ, gandhāyatanaṃ, rasāyatanaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, manāyatanaṃ, dhammāyatanaṃ.
vb18:133.4: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe etesaṃ imāni sattāyatanāni pātubhavanti. #2
vb18:134.1: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassa ekādasa dhātuyo pātubhavanti?
vb18:134.2: Kāmāvacarānaṃ devānaṃ, paṭhamakappikānaṃ manussānaṃ, opapātikānaṃ petānaṃ, opapātikānaṃ asurānaṃ, opapātikānaṃ tiracchānagatānaṃ nerayikānaṃ paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe ekādasa dhātuyo pātubhavanti—
vb18:134.3: cakkhudhātu, rūpadhātu, sotadhātu, ghānadhātu, gandhadhātu, jivhādhātu, rasadhātu, kāyadhātu, phoṭṭhabbadhātu, manoviññāṇadhātu, dhammadhātu.
vb18:134.4: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe etesaṃ imā ekādasa dhātuyo pātubhavanti.
vb18:135.1: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassa dasa dhātuyo pātubhavanti?
vb18:135.2: Opapātikānaṃ petānaṃ, opapātikānaṃ asurānaṃ, opapātikānaṃ tiracchānagatānaṃ nerayikānaṃ, jaccandhānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe dasa dhātuyo pātubhavanti—
vb18:135.3: rūpadhātu, sotadhātu, ghānadhātu, gandhadhātu, jivhādhātu, rasadhātu, kāyadhātu, phoṭṭhabbadhātu, manoviññāṇadhātu, dhammadhātu.
vb18:135.4: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe etesaṃ imā dasa dhātuyo pātubhavanti.
vb18:136.1: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassa aparā dasa dhātuyo pātubhavanti?
vb18:136.2: Opapātikānaṃ petānaṃ, opapātikānaṃ asurānaṃ, opapātikānaṃ tiracchānagatānaṃ nerayikānaṃ, jaccabadhirānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe dasa dhātuyo pātubhavanti—
vb18:136.3: cakkhudhātu, rūpadhātu, ghānadhātu, gandhadhātu, jivhādhātu, rasadhātu, kāyadhātu, phoṭṭhabbadhātu, manoviññāṇadhātu, dhammadhātu.
vb18:136.4: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe etesaṃ imā dasa dhātuyo pātubhavanti.
vb18:137.1: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassa nava dhātuyo pātubhavanti?
vb18:137.2: Opapātikānaṃ petānaṃ, opapātikānaṃ asurānaṃ, opapātikānaṃ tiracchānagatānaṃ nerayikānaṃ, jaccandhabadhirānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe nava dhātuyo pātubhavanti—
vb18:137.3: rūpadhātu, ghānadhātu, gandhadhātu, jivhādhātu, rasadhātu, kāyadhātu, phoṭṭhabbadhātu, manoviññāṇadhātu, dhammadhātu.
vb18:137.4: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe etesaṃ imā nava dhātuyo pātubhavanti.
vb18:138.1: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassa satta dhātuyo pātubhavanti?
vb18:138.2: Gabbhaseyyakānaṃ sattānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe satta dhātuyo pātubhavanti—
vb18:138.3: rūpadhātu, gandhadhātu, rasadhātu, kāyadhātu, phoṭṭhabbadhātu, manoviññāṇadhātu, dhammadhātu.
vb18:138.4: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe etesaṃ imā satta dhātuyo pātubhavanti. #3
vb18:139.1: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe sabbesaṃ katamaṃ ekaṃ saccaṃ pātubhavati?
vb18:139.3: kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe sabbesaṃ idaṃ ekaṃ saccaṃ pātubhavati. #4
vb18:140.2: Kāmāvacarānaṃ devānaṃ, sahetukānaṃ ñāṇasampayuttānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe cuddasindriyāni pātubhavanti—
vb18:140.3: cakkhundriyaṃ, sotindriyaṃ, ghānindriyaṃ, jivhindriyaṃ, kāyindriyaṃ, manindriyaṃ, itthindriyaṃ vā purisindriyaṃ vā, jīvitindriyaṃ, somanassindriyaṃ vā upekkhindriyaṃ vā, saddhindriyaṃ, vīriyindriyaṃ, satindriyaṃ, samādhindriyaṃ, paññindriyaṃ.
vb18:140.4: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe etesaṃ imāni cuddasindriyāni pātubhavanti.
vb18:141.2: Kāmāvacarānaṃ devānaṃ sahetukānaṃ ñāṇavippayuttānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe terasindriyāni pātubhavanti—
vb18:141.3: cakkhundriyaṃ, sotindriyaṃ, ghānindriyaṃ, jivhindriyaṃ, kāyindriyaṃ, manindriyaṃ, itthindriyaṃ vā purisindriyaṃ vā, jīvitindriyaṃ, somanassindriyaṃ vā upekkhindriyaṃ vā, saddhindriyaṃ, vīriyindriyaṃ, satindriyaṃ, samādhindriyaṃ.
vb18:141.4: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe etesaṃ imāni terasindriyāni pātubhavanti.
vb18:142.1: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassa aparāni terasindriyāni pātubhavanti?
vb18:142.2: Paṭhamakappikānaṃ manussānaṃ sahetukānaṃ ñāṇasampayuttānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe terasindriyāni pātubhavanti—
vb18:142.3: cakkhundriyaṃ, sotindriyaṃ, ghānindriyaṃ, jivhindriyaṃ, kāyindriyaṃ, manindriyaṃ, jīvitindriyaṃ, somanassindriyaṃ vā upekkhindriyaṃ vā, saddhindriyaṃ, vīriyindriyaṃ, satindriyaṃ, samādhindriyaṃ, paññindriyaṃ.
vb18:142.4: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe etesaṃ imāni terasindriyāni pātubhavanti.
vb18:143.2: Paṭhamakappikānaṃ manussānaṃ sahetukānaṃ ñāṇavippayuttānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe dvādasindriyāni pātubhavanti—
vb18:143.3: cakkhundriyaṃ, sotindriyaṃ, ghānindriyaṃ, jivhindriyaṃ, kāyindriyaṃ, manindriyaṃ, jīvitindriyaṃ, somanassindriyaṃ vā upekkhindriyaṃ vā, saddhindriyaṃ, vīriyindriyaṃ, satindriyaṃ, samādhindriyaṃ.
vb18:143.4: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe etesaṃ imāni dvādasindriyāni pātubhavanti.
vb18:144.2: Gabbhaseyyakānaṃ sattānaṃ sahetukānaṃ ñāṇasampayuttānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe dasindriyāni pātubhavanti—
vb18:144.3: kāyindriyaṃ, manindriyaṃ, itthindriyaṃ vā purisindriyaṃ vā, jīvitindriyaṃ, somanassindriyaṃ vā upekkhindriyaṃ vā, saddhindriyaṃ, vīriyindriyaṃ, satindriyaṃ, samādhindriyaṃ, paññindriyaṃ.
vb18:144.4: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe etesaṃ imāni dasindriyāni pātubhavanti.
vb18:145.2: Gabbhaseyyakānaṃ sattānaṃ sahetukānaṃ ñāṇavippayuttānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe navindriyāni pātubhavanti—
vb18:145.3: kāyindriyaṃ, manindriyaṃ, itthindriyaṃ vā purisindriyaṃ vā, jīvitindriyaṃ, somanassindriyaṃ vā upekkhindriyaṃ vā, saddhindriyaṃ, vīriyindriyaṃ, satindriyaṃ, samādhindriyaṃ.
vb18:145.4: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe etesaṃ imāni navindriyāni pātubhavanti.
vb18:146.1: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassa aparāni navindriyāni pātubhavanti?
vb18:146.2: Opapātikānaṃ petānaṃ, opapātikānaṃ asurānaṃ, opapātikānaṃ tiracchānagatānaṃ nerayikānaṃ paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe navindriyāni pātubhavanti—
vb18:146.3: cakkhundriyaṃ, sotindriyaṃ, ghānindriyaṃ, jivhindriyaṃ, kāyindriyaṃ, manindriyaṃ, itthindriyaṃ vā purisindriyaṃ vā, jīvitindriyaṃ, upekkhindriyaṃ.
vb18:146.4: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe etesaṃ imāni navindriyāni pātubhavanti.
vb18:147.2: Opapātikānaṃ petānaṃ, opapātikānaṃ asurānaṃ, opapātikānaṃ tiracchānagatānaṃ nerayikānaṃ, jaccandhānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe aṭṭhindriyāni pātubhavanti—
vb18:147.3: sotindriyaṃ, ghānindriyaṃ, jivhindriyaṃ, kāyindriyaṃ, manindriyaṃ, itthindriyaṃ vā purisindriyaṃ vā, jīvitindriyaṃ, upekkhindriyaṃ.
vb18:147.4: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe etesaṃ imāni aṭṭhindriyāni pātubhavanti.
vb18:148.1: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassa aparāni aṭṭhindriyāni pātubhavanti?
vb18:148.2: Opapātikānaṃ petānaṃ, opapātikānaṃ asurānaṃ, opapātikānaṃ tiracchānagatānaṃ nerayikānaṃ, jaccabadhirānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe aṭṭhindriyāni pātubhavanti—
vb18:148.3: cakkhundriyaṃ, ghānindriyaṃ, jivhindriyaṃ, kāyindriyaṃ manindriyaṃ, itthindriyaṃ vā purisindriyaṃ vā, jīvitindriyaṃ, upekkhindriyaṃ.
vb18:148.4: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe etesaṃ imāni aṭṭhindriyāni pātubhavanti.
vb18:149.2: Opapātikānaṃ petānaṃ, opapātikānaṃ asurānaṃ, opapātikānaṃ tiracchānagatānaṃ nerayikānaṃ, jaccandhabadhirānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe sattindriyāni pātubhavanti—
vb18:149.3: ghānindriyaṃ, jivhindriyaṃ, kāyindriyaṃ, manindriyaṃ, itthindriyaṃ vā purisindriyaṃ vā, jīvitindriyaṃ, upekkhindriyaṃ.
vb18:149.4: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe etesaṃ imāni sattindriyāni pātubhavanti.
vb18:150.2: Gabbhaseyyakānaṃ sattānaṃ ahetukānaṃ, ṭhapetvā napuṃsakānaṃ, upapattikkhaṇe pañcindriyāni pātubhavanti—
vb18:150.3: kāyindriyaṃ, manindriyaṃ, itthindriyaṃ vā purisindriyaṃ vā, jīvitindriyaṃ, upekkhindriyaṃ.
vb18:150.4: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe etesaṃ imāni pañcindriyāni pātubhavanti.
vb18:151.2: Gabbhaseyyakānaṃ sattānaṃ ahetukānaṃ, napuṃsakānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe cattārindriyāni pātubhavanti—
vb18:151.4: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe etesaṃ imāni cattārindriyāni pātubhavanti. #5
vb18:152.1: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassa tayo hetū pātubhavanti?
vb18:152.2: Kāmāvacarānaṃ devānaṃ, paṭhamakappikānaṃ manussānaṃ, gabbhaseyyakānaṃ sattānaṃ sahetukānaṃ ñāṇasampayuttānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe tayo hetū pātubhavanti—
vb18:152.3: alobho vipākahetu, adoso vipākahetu, amoho vipākahetu.
vb18:152.4: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe etesaṃ ime tayo hetū pātubhavanti.
vb18:153.1: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassa dve hetū pātubhavanti?
vb18:153.2: Kāmāvacarānaṃ devānaṃ, paṭhamakappikānaṃ manussānaṃ, gabbhaseyyakānaṃ sattānaṃ sahetukānaṃ ñāṇavippayuttānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe dve hetū pātubhavanti—
vb18:153.4: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe etesaṃ ime dve hetū pātubhavanti.
vb18:154.1: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe sabbesaṃ katame cattāro āhārā pātubhavanti?
vb18:154.3: kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe sabbesaṃ ime cattāro āhārā pātubhavanti. #7
vb18:155.1: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe sabbesaṃ katamo eko phasso pātubhavati?
vb18:155.3: kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe sabbesaṃ ayaṃ eko phasso pātubhavati. #8
vb18:156.1: Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe sabbesaṃ katamā ekā vedanā … pe …
vb18:156.9: kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe sabbesaṃ idaṃ ekaṃ cittaṃ pātubhavati. #9–12
vb18:158.1: Rūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kati khandhā pātubhavanti  … pe … kati cittāni pātubhavanti?
vb18:159.1: Rūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe, ṭhapetvā asaññasattānaṃ devānaṃ, pañcakkhandhā pātubhavanti, pañcāyatanāni pātubhavanti, pañca dhātuyo pātubhavanti, ekaṃ saccaṃ pātubhavati, dasindriyāni pātubhavanti, tayo hetū pātubhavanti, tayo āhārā pātubhavanti, eko phasso pātubhavati, ekā vedanā … pe … ekā saññā … pe … ekā cetanā … pe … ekaṃ cittaṃ pātubhavati.
vb18:162.1: Rūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe katamā pañca dhātuyo pātubhavanti?
vb18:162.3: rūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe imā pañca dhātuyo pātubhavanti. #3
vb18:163.1: Rūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe katamaṃ ekaṃ saccaṃ pātubhavati?
vb18:163.3: rūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe idaṃ ekaṃ saccaṃ pātubhavati. #4
vb18:164.2: Cakkhundriyaṃ, sotindriyaṃ, manindriyaṃ, jīvitindriyaṃ, somanassindriyaṃ vā upekkhindriyaṃ vā, saddhindriyaṃ, vīriyindriyaṃ, satindriyaṃ, samādhindriyaṃ, paññindriyaṃ—
vb18:165.1: Rūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe katame tayo hetū pātubhavanti?
vb18:165.2: Alobho vipākahetu, adoso vipākahetu, amoho vipākahetu—
vb18:165.3: rūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe ime tayo hetū pātubhavanti. #6
vb18:166.1: Rūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe katame tayo āhārā pātubhavanti?
vb18:166.3: rūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe ime tayo āhārā pātubhavanti. #7
vb18:167.1: Rūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe katamo eko phasso pātubhavati?
vb18:167.3: rūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe ayaṃ eko phasso pātubhavati. #8
vb18:168.1: Rūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe katamā ekā vedanā … pe …
vb18:168.9: rūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe idaṃ ekaṃ cittaṃ pātubhavati. #9–12
vb18:170.1: Asaññasattānaṃ devānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe kati khandhā pātubhavanti  … pe … kati cittāni pātubhavanti?
vb18:171.1: Asaññasattānaṃ devānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe eko khandho pātubhavati—
vb18:171.11: Asaññasattā devā ahetukā anāhārā aphassakā avedanakā asaññakā acetanakā acittakā pātubhavanti.
vb18:173.1: Arūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kati khandhā pātubhavanti  … pe … kati cittāni pātubhavanti?
vb18:174.1: Arūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe cattāro khandhā pātubhavanti, dve āyatanāni pātubhavanti, dve dhātuyo pātubhavanti, ekaṃ saccaṃ pātubhavati, aṭṭhindriyāni pātubhavanti, tayo hetū pātubhavanti, tayo āhārā pātubhavanti, eko phasso pātubhavati, ekā vedanā … pe … ekā saññā … pe … ekā cetanā … pe … ekaṃ cittaṃ pātubhavati.
vb18:175.1: Arūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe katame cattāro khandhā pātubhavanti?
vb18:175.3: arūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe ime cattāro khandhā pātubhavanti. #1
vb18:176.1: Arūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe katamāni dve āyatanāni pātubhavanti?
vb18:176.3: arūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe imāni dve āyatanāni pātubhavanti. #2
vb18:177.1: Arūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe katamā dve dhātuyo pātubhavanti?
vb18:177.3: arūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe imā dve dhātuyo pātubhavanti. #3
vb18:178.1: Arūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe katamaṃ ekaṃ saccaṃ pātubhavati?
vb18:178.3: arūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe idaṃ ekaṃ saccaṃ pātubhavati. #4
vb18:179.2: Manindriyaṃ, jīvitindriyaṃ, upekkhindriyaṃ, saddhindriyaṃ, vīriyindriyaṃ, satindriyaṃ, samādhindriyaṃ, paññindriyaṃ—
vb18:180.1: Arūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe katame tayo hetū pātubhavanti?
vb18:180.2: Alobho vipākahetu, adoso vipākahetu, amoho vipākahetu—
vb18:180.3: arūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe ime tayo hetū pātubhavanti. #6
vb18:181.1: Arūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe katame tayo āhārā pātubhavanti?
vb18:181.3: arūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe ime tayo āhārā pātubhavanti. #7
vb18:182.1: Arūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe katamo eko phasso pātubhavati?
vb18:182.3: arūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe ayaṃ eko phasso pātubhavati. #8
vb18:183.1: Arūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe katamā ekā vedanā … pe …
vb18:183.9: arūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe idaṃ ekaṃ cittaṃ pātubhavati. #9–12
vb18:185.1: Kāmāvacarā dhammā, na kāmāvacarā dhammā, rūpāvacarā dhammā, na rūpāvacarā dhammā, arūpāvacarā dhammā, na arūpāvacarā dhammā, pariyāpannā dhammā, apariyāpannā dhammā.
vb18:186.2: Heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṃ pariyantaṃ karitvā, uparito paranimmitavasavattī deve antokaritvā, yaṃ etasmiṃ antare etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā khandhadhātuāyatanā;
vb18:188.2: Heṭṭhato brahmalokaṃ pariyantaṃ karitvā, uparito akaniṭṭhe deve antokaritvā, yaṃ etasmiṃ antare etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissa vā cittacetasikā dhammā—
vb18:190.2: Heṭṭhato ākāsānañcāyatanūpage deve pariyantaṃ karitvā, uparito nevasaññānāsaññāyatanūpage deve antokaritvā, yaṃ etasmiṃ antare etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissa vā cittacetasikā dhammā—
vb18:192.2: Sāsavā kusalākusalābyākatā dhammā kāmāvacarā, rūpāvacarā, arūpāvacarā, rūpakkhandho, vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho, viññāṇakkhandho—
vb18:193.2: Maggā ca, maggaphalāni ca, asaṅkhatā ca dhātu—
vb18:200.1: Dānaṃ datvā, sīlaṃ samādiyitvā, uposathakammaṃ katvā kattha upapajjanti?
vb18:200.2: Dānaṃ datvā, sīlaṃ samādiyitvā, uposathakammaṃ katvā appekacce khattiyamahāsālānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti, appekacce brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti, appekacce gahapatimahāsālānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti, appekacce cātumahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti, appekacce tāvatiṃsānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti, appekacce yāmānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti, appekacce tusitānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti, appekacce nimmānaratīnaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti, appekacce paranimmitavasavattīnaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti.
vb18:203.2: Yāni mānusakāni paññāsa vassāni, cātumahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ eso eko rattindivo.
vb18:203.5: Tena saṃvaccharena dibbāni pañca vassasatāni cātumahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ.
vb18:204.2: Yaṃ mānusakaṃ vassasataṃ, tāvatiṃsānaṃ devānaṃ eso eko rattindivo.
vb18:204.5: Tena saṃvaccharena dibbaṃ vassasahassaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ devānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ.
vb18:204.7: Tisso ca vassakoṭiyo saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassāni. #3
vb18:205.2: Yāni mānusakāni dve vassasatāni, yāmānaṃ devānaṃ eso eko rattindivo.
vb18:205.5: Tena saṃvaccharena dibbāni dve vassasahassāni yāmānaṃ devānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ.
vb18:206.2: Yāni mānusakāni cattāri vassasatāni, tusitānaṃ devānaṃ eso eko rattindivo.
vb18:206.5: Tena saṃvaccharena dibbāni cattāri vassasahassāni tusitānaṃ devānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ.
vb18:207.2: Yāni mānusakāni aṭṭha vassasatāni, nimmānaratīnaṃ devānaṃ eso eko rattindivo.
vb18:207.5: Tena saṃvaccharena dibbāni aṭṭha vassasahassāni nimmānaratīnaṃ devānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ.
vb18:207.7: Dve vassakoṭisatāni tiṃsañca vassakoṭiyo cattārīsañca vassasatasahassāni. #6
vb18:208.2: Yāni mānusakāni soḷasa vassasatāni, paranimmitavasavattīnaṃ devānaṃ eso eko rattindivo.
vb18:208.5: Tena saṃvaccharena dibbāni soḷasa vassasahassāni paranimmitavasavattīnaṃ devānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ.
vb18:208.7: Nava ca vassakoṭisatāni ekavīsañca vassakoṭiyo saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassānīti. #7
vb18:211.1: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ parittaṃ bhāvetvā kattha upapajjanti?
vb18:211.2: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ parittaṃ bhāvetvā brahmapārisajjānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti.
vb18:212.1: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ majjhimaṃ bhāvetvā kattha upapajjanti?
vb18:212.2: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ majjhimaṃ bhāvetvā brahmapurohitānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti.
vb18:213.1: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ paṇītaṃ bhāvetvā kattha upapajjanti?
vb18:213.2: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ paṇītaṃ bhāvetvā mahābrahmānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti.
vb18:214.1: Dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ parittaṃ bhāvetvā kattha upapajjanti?
vb18:214.2: Dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ parittaṃ bhāvetvā parittābhānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti.
vb18:215.1: Dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ majjhimaṃ bhāvetvā kattha upapajjanti?
vb18:215.2: Dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ majjhimaṃ bhāvetvā appamāṇābhānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti.
vb18:216.1: Dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ paṇītaṃ bhāvetvā kattha upapajjanti?
vb18:216.2: Dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ paṇītaṃ bhāvetvā ābhassarānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti.
vb18:217.1: Tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ parittaṃ bhāvetvā kattha upapajjanti?
vb18:217.2: Tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ parittaṃ bhāvetvā parittasubhānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti.
vb18:218.1: Tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ majjhimaṃ bhāvetvā kattha upapajjanti?
vb18:218.2: Tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ majjhimaṃ bhāvetvā appamāṇasubhānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti.
vb18:219.1: Tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ paṇītaṃ bhāvetvā kattha upapajjanti?
vb18:219.2: Tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ paṇītaṃ bhāvetvā subhakiṇhānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti.
vb18:220.1: Catutthaṃ jhānaṃ bhāvetvā ārammaṇanānattatā manasikāranānattatā chandanānattatā paṇidhinānattatā adhimokkhanānattatā abhinīhāranānattatā paññānānattatā appekacce asaññasattānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti, appekacce vehapphalānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti, appekacce avihānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti, appekacce atappānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti, appekacce sudassānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti, appekacce sudassīnaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti, appekacce akaniṭṭhānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti, appekacce ākāsānañcāyatanūpagānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti, appekacce viññāṇañcāyatanūpagānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti, appekacce ākiñcaññāyatanūpagānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti, appekacce nevasaññānāsaññāyatanūpagānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjanti. #17
vb18:236.1: Pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ kati abhiññeyyā, kati pariññeyyā, kati pahātabbā, kati bhāvetabbā, kati sacchikātabbā, kati na pahātabbā, na bhāvetabbā, na sacchikātabbā … pe … sattannaṃ cittānaṃ kati abhiññeyyā, kati pariññeyyā, kati pahātabbā, kati bhāvetabbā, kati sacchikātabbā, kati na pahātabbā na bhāvetabbā na sacchikātabbā?
vb18:237.1: Rūpakkhandho abhiññeyyo pariññeyyo na pahātabbo na bhāvetabbo na sacchikātabbo.
vb18:237.2: Cattāro khandhā abhiññeyyā pariññeyyā, siyā pahātabbā, siyā bhāvetabbā, siyā sacchikātabbā, siyā na pahātabbā na bhāvetabbā na sacchikātabbā. #1
vb18:238.1: Dasāyatanā abhiññeyyā pariññeyyā na pahātabbā na bhāvetabbā na sacchikātabbā.
vb18:238.2: Dve āyatanā abhiññeyyā pariññeyyā, siyā pahātabbā, siyā bhāvetabbā, siyā sacchikātabbā, siyā na pahātabbā na bhāvetabbā na sacchikātabbā. #2
vb18:239.1: Soḷasa dhātuyo abhiññeyyā pariññeyyā na pahātabbā na bhāvetabbā na sacchikātabbā.
vb18:239.2: Dve dhātuyo abhiññeyyā pariññeyyā, siyā pahātabbā, siyā bhāvetabbā, siyā sacchikātabbā, siyā na pahātabbā na bhāvetabbā na sacchikātabbā. #3
vb18:240.1: Samudayasaccaṃ abhiññeyyaṃ pariññeyyaṃ pahātabbaṃ na bhāvetabbaṃ na sacchikātabbaṃ.
vb18:240.2: Maggasaccaṃ abhiññeyyaṃ pariññeyyaṃ na pahātabbaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ na sacchikātabbaṃ.
vb18:240.3: Nirodhasaccaṃ abhiññeyyaṃ pariññeyyaṃ na pahātabbaṃ na bhāvetabbaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ.
vb18:240.4: Dukkhasaccaṃ abhiññeyyaṃ pariññeyyaṃ, siyā pahātabbaṃ, na bhāvetabbaṃ, na sacchikātabbaṃ, siyā na pahātabbaṃ. #4
vb18:241.1: Navindriyā abhiññeyyā pariññeyyā na pahātabbā na bhāvetabbā na sacchikātabbā.
vb18:241.2: Domanassindriyaṃ abhiññeyyaṃ pariññeyyaṃ pahātabbaṃ na bhāvetabbaṃ na sacchikātabbaṃ.
vb18:241.3: Anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ abhiññeyyaṃ pariññeyyaṃ na pahātabbaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ na sacchikātabbaṃ.
vb18:241.4: Aññindriyaṃ abhiññeyyaṃ pariññeyyaṃ na pahātabbaṃ, siyā bhāvetabbaṃ, siyā sacchikātabbaṃ.
vb18:241.5: Aññātāvindriyaṃ abhiññeyyaṃ pariññeyyaṃ na pahātabbaṃ na bhāvetabbaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ.
vb18:241.6: Tīṇindriyā abhiññeyyā pariññeyyā na pahātabbā, siyā bhāvetabbā, siyā sacchikātabbā, siyā na bhāvetabbā, sacchikātabbā.
vb18:241.7: Cha indriyā abhiññeyyā pariññeyyā, siyā pahātabbā, siyā bhāvetabbā, siyā sacchikātabbā, siyā na pahātabbā na bhāvetabbā na sacchikātabbā. #5
vb18:242.1: Tayo akusalahetū abhiññeyyā pariññeyyā pahātabbā na bhāvetabbā na sacchikātabbā.
vb18:242.2: Tayo kusalahetū abhiññeyyā pariññeyyā na pahātabbā, siyā bhāvetabbā, na sacchikātabbā, siyā na bhāvetabbā.
vb18:242.3: Tayo abyākatahetū abhiññeyyā pariññeyyā na pahātabbā na bhāvetabbā, siyā sacchikātabbā, siyā na sacchikātabbā. #6
vb18:243.1: Kabaḷīkāro āhāro abhiññeyyo pariññeyyo na pahātabbo na bhāvetabbo na sacchikātabbo.
vb18:243.2: Tayo āhārā abhiññeyyā pariññeyyā, siyā pahātabbā, siyā bhāvetabbā, siyā sacchikātabbā, siyā na pahātabbā na bhāvetabbā na sacchikātabbā. #7
vb18:244.1: Cha phassā abhiññeyyā pariññeyyā na pahātabbā na bhāvetabbā na sacchikātabbā.
vb18:244.2: Manoviññāṇadhātusamphasso abhiññeyyo pariññeyyo, siyā pahātabbo, siyā bhāvetabbo, siyā sacchikātabbo, siyā na pahātabbo na bhāvetabbo na sacchikātabbo. #8
vb18:245.7: cha cittā abhiññeyyā pariññeyyā na pahātabbā na bhāvetabbā na sacchikātabbā.
vb18:245.8: Manoviññāṇadhātu abhiññeyyā pariññeyyā, siyā pahātabbā, siyā bhāvetabbā, siyā sacchikātabbā, siyā na pahātabbā na bhāvetabbā na sacchikātabbā. #9–12
vb18:247.1: Pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ kati sārammaṇā, kati anārammaṇā … pe … sattannaṃ cittānaṃ kati sārammaṇā, kati anārammaṇā?
vb18:253.1: Pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ kati sārammaṇārammaṇā, kati anārammaṇārammaṇā … pe … sattannaṃ cittānaṃ kati sārammaṇārammaṇā, kati anārammaṇārammaṇā?
vb18:254.2: Cattāro khandhā siyā sārammaṇārammaṇā, siyā anārammaṇārammaṇā. #1
vb18:255.3: Dhammāyatanaṃ siyā sārammaṇārammaṇaṃ, siyā anārammaṇārammaṇaṃ, siyā anārammaṇaṃ. #2
vb18:256.4: Dhammadhātu siyā sārammaṇārammaṇā, siyā anārammaṇārammaṇā, siyā anārammaṇā. #3
vb18:257.4: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā sārammaṇārammaṇaṃ, siyā anārammaṇārammaṇaṃ, siyā anārammaṇaṃ. #4
vb18:258.4: Jīvitindriyaṃ siyā sārammaṇārammaṇaṃ, siyā anārammaṇārammaṇaṃ, siyā anārammaṇaṃ. #5
vb18:259.1: Nava hetū siyā sārammaṇārammaṇā, siyā anārammaṇārammaṇā.
vb18:259.3: Tayo āhārā siyā sārammaṇārammaṇā, siyā anārammaṇārammaṇā.
vb18:261.1: Pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ kati diṭṭhā, kati sutā, kati mutā, kati viññātā, kati na diṭṭhā na sutā na mutā na viññātā … pe … sattannaṃ cittānaṃ kati diṭṭhā, kati sutā, kati mutā, kati viññātā, kati na diṭṭhā na sutā na mutā na viññātā?
vb18:262.1: Rūpakkhandho siyā diṭṭho, siyā suto, siyā muto, siyā viññāto, siyā na diṭṭho na suto na muto, viññāto.
vb18:262.2: Cattāro khandhā na diṭṭhā na sutā na mutā, viññātā.
vb18:263.1: Rūpāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, na sutaṃ na mutaṃ, viññātaṃ.
vb18:263.2: Saddāyatanaṃ na diṭṭhaṃ, sutaṃ, na mutaṃ, viññātaṃ.
vb18:263.7: phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ na diṭṭhaṃ na sutaṃ, mutaṃ, viññātaṃ.
vb18:263.8: Sattāyatanā na diṭṭhā na sutā na mutā, viññātā.
vb18:264.1: Rūpadhātu diṭṭhā, na sutā na mutā, viññātā.
vb18:264.2: Saddadhātu na diṭṭhā, sutā, na mutā, viññātā.
vb18:264.7: phoṭṭhabbadhātu na diṭṭhā na sutā, mutā, viññātā.
vb18:264.8: Terasa dhātuyo na diṭṭhā na sutā na mutā, viññātā.
vb18:265.1: Tīṇi saccāni na diṭṭhā na sutā na mutā, viññātā.
vb18:265.2: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā diṭṭhaṃ, siyā sutaṃ, siyā mutaṃ, siyā viññātaṃ, siyā na diṭṭhaṃ na sutaṃ na mutaṃ, viññātaṃ.
vb18:266.1: Bāvīsatindriyā na diṭṭhā na sutā na mutā, viññātā.
vb18:266.2: Nava hetū na diṭṭhā na sutā na mutā, viññātā.
vb18:266.3: Cattāro āhārā na diṭṭhā na sutā na mutā, viññātā.
vb18:266.4: Satta phassā na diṭṭhā na sutā na mutā, viññātā.
vb18:266.11: satta cittā na diṭṭhā na sutā na mutā, viññātā.
vb18:269.1: Pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ kati kusalā, kati akusalā, kati abyākatā … pe … sattannaṃ cittānaṃ kati kusalā, kati akusalā, kati abyākatā?
vb18:270.2: Cattāro khandhā siyā kusalā, siyā akusalā, siyā abyākatā.
vb18:270.4: Dvāyatanā siyā kusalā, siyā akusalā, siyā abyākatā.
vb18:270.6: Dve dhātuyo siyā kusalā, siyā akusalā, siyā abyākatā.
vb18:270.10: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā kusalaṃ, siyā akusalaṃ, siyā abyākataṃ.
vb18:271.5: Cha indriyā siyā kusalā, siyā akusalā, siyā abyākatā.
vb18:272.5: Tayo āhārā siyā kusalā, siyā akusalā, siyā abyākatā.
vb18:272.7: Manoviññāṇadhātusamphasso siyā kusalo, siyā akusalo, siyā abyākato.
vb18:272.15: Manoviññāṇadhātu siyā kusalā, siyā akusalā, siyā abyākatā.
vb18:274.1: Pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ kati sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, kati dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, kati adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā … pe … sattannaṃ cittānaṃ kati sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, kati dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, kati adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā?
vb18:275.1: Dve khandhā na vattabbā “sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”tipi, “dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”tipi, “adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”tipi.
vb18:275.2: Tayo khandhā siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā. #1
vb18:276.1: Dasāyatanā na vattabbā “sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”tipi, “dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”tipi, “adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”tipi.
vb18:276.2: Manāyatanaṃ siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ, siyā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ.
vb18:276.3: Dhammāyatanaṃ siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ, siyā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ, siyā na vattabbaṃ “sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttan”tipi, “dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttan”tipi, “adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttan”tipi. #2
vb18:277.1: Dasa dhātuyo na vattabbā “sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”tipi, “dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”tipi, “adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”tipi.
vb18:277.2: Pañca dhātuyo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, kāyaviññāṇadhātu siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā.
vb18:277.3: Manoviññāṇadhātu siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā.
vb18:277.4: Dhammadhātu siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā na vattabbā “sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”tipi, “dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”tipi, “adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”tipi. #3
vb18:278.1: Dve saccā siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā.
vb18:278.2: Nirodhasaccaṃ na vattabbaṃ “sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttan”tipi, “dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttan”tipi, “adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttan”tipi.
vb18:278.3: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ, siyā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ, siyā na vattabbaṃ “sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttan”tipi, “dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttan”tipi, “adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttan”tipi. #4
vb18:279.1: Dvādasindriyā na vattabbā “sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”tipi, “dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”tipi, “adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”tipi.
vb18:279.2: Cha indriyā siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā.
vb18:279.3: Tīṇindriyā siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā.
vb18:279.4: Jīvitindriyaṃ siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ, siyā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ, siyā na vattabbaṃ “sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttan”tipi, “dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttan”tipi, “adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttan”tipi. #5
vb18:280.2: Satta hetū siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā.
vb18:280.3: Moho akusalahetu siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto, siyā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto. #6
vb18:281.1: Kabaḷīkāro āhāro na vattabbo “sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto”tipi, “dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto”tipi, “adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto”tipi.
vb18:281.2: Tayo āhārā siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā. #7
vb18:282.2: Kāyaviññāṇadhātusamphasso siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto, siyā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto.
vb18:282.3: Manoviññāṇadhātusamphasso siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto, siyā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto. #8
vb18:283.1: Satta vedanā na vattabbā “sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”tipi, “dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”tipi, “adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”tipi.
vb18:283.6: pañca cittā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, kāyaviññāṇadhātu siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā.
vb18:283.7: Manoviññāṇadhātu siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā. #9–12
vb18:285.1: Pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ kati vipākā, kati vipākadhammadhammā, kati nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā … pe … sattannaṃ cittānaṃ kati vipākā, kati vipākadhammadhammā, kati nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā?
vb18:286.2: Cattāro khandhā siyā vipākā, siyā vipākadhammadhammā, siyā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā. #1
vb18:287.2: Dvāyatanā siyā vipākā, siyā vipākadhammadhammā, siyā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā. #2
vb18:288.4: Dve dhātuyo siyā vipākā siyā vipākadhammadhammā, siyā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā. #3
vb18:289.3: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā vipākaṃ, siyā vipākadhammadhammaṃ, siyā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ. #4
vb18:290.5: Navindriyā siyā vipākā, siyā vipākadhammadhammā, siyā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā. #5
vb18:291.2: Tayo abyākatahetū siyā vipākā, siyā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā. #6
vb18:292.2: Tayo āhārā siyā vipākā, siyā vipākadhammadhammā, siyā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā.
vb18:292.5: Manoviññāṇadhātusamphasso siyā vipāko, siyā vipākadhammadhammo, siyā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo.
vb18:292.14: Manoviññāṇadhātu siyā vipākā, siyā vipākadhammadhammā, siyā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā. #7–12
vb18:294.1: Pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ kati upādinnupādāniyā, kati anupādinnupādāniyā, kati anupādinnaanupādāniyā … pe … sattannaṃ cittānaṃ kati upādinnupādāniyā, kati anupādinnupādāniyā, kati anupādinnaanupādāniyā?
vb18:295.2: Cattāro khandhā siyā upādinnupādāniyā, siyā anupādinnupādāniyā, siyā anupādinnaanupādāniyā. #1
vb18:296.3: Cattāro āyatanā siyā upādinnupādāniyā, siyā anupādinnupādāniyā.
vb18:296.4: Dvāyatanā siyā upādinnupādāniyā, siyā anupādinnupādāniyā, siyā anupādinnaanupādāniyā. #2
vb18:297.3: Pañca dhātuyo siyā upādinnupādāniyā, siyā anupādinnupādāniyā.
vb18:297.4: Dve dhātuyo siyā upādinnupādāniyā, siyā anupādinnupādāniyā, siyā anupādinnaanupādāniyā. #3
vb18:299.4: Navindriyā siyā upādinnupādāniyā, siyā anupādinnupādāniyā, siyā anupādinnaanupādāniyā.
vb18:299.6: Tayo kusalahetū siyā anupādinnupādāniyā, siyā anupādinnaanupādāniyā.
vb18:299.7: Tayo abyākatahetū siyā upādinnupādāniyā, siyā anupādinnupādāniyā, siyā anupādinnaanupādāniyā. #5
vb18:300.1: Kabaḷīkāro āhāro siyā upādinnupādāniyo, siyā anupādinnupādāniyo.
vb18:300.2: Tayo āhārā siyā upādinnupādāniyā, siyā anupādinnupādāniyā, siyā anupādinnaanupādāniyā. #6
vb18:301.3: Manoviññāṇadhātusamphasso siyā upādinnupādāniyo, siyā anupādinnupādāniyo, siyā anupādinnaanupādāniyo.
vb18:301.12: Manoviññāṇadhātu siyā upādinnupādāniyā, siyā anupādinnupādāniyā, siyā anupādinnaanupādāniyā. #7–12
vb18:303.1: Pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ kati savitakkasavicārā, kati avitakkavicāramattā, kati avitakkaavicārā … pe … sattannaṃ cittānaṃ kati savitakkasavicārā, kati avitakkavicāramattā, kati avitakkaavicārā?
vb18:304.2: Tayo khandhā siyā savitakkasavicārā, siyā avitakkavicāramattā, siyā avitakkaavicārā.
vb18:304.3: Saṅkhārakkhandho siyā savitakkasavicāro, siyā avitakkavicāramatto, siyā avitakkaavicāro siyā na vattabbo “savitakkasavicāro”tipi, “avitakkavicāramatto”tipi, “avitakkaavicāro”tipi. #1
vb18:305.2: Manāyatanaṃ siyā savitakkasavicāraṃ, siyā avitakkavicāramattaṃ, siyā avitakkaavicāraṃ.
vb18:305.3: Dhammāyatanaṃ siyā savitakkasavicāraṃ, siyā avitakkavicāramattaṃ, siyā avitakkaavicāraṃ, siyā na vattabbaṃ “savitakkasavicāran”tipi, “avitakkavicāramattan”tipi, “avitakkaavicāran”tipi. #2
vb18:306.3: Manoviññāṇadhātu siyā savitakkasavicārā, siyā avitakkavicāramattā, siyā avitakkaavicārā.
vb18:306.4: Dhammadhātu siyā savitakkasavicārā, siyā avitakkavicāramattā, siyā avitakkaavicārā, siyā na vattabbā “savitakkasavicārā”tipi, “avitakkavicāramattā”tipi, “avitakkaavicārā”tipi. #3
vb18:307.3: Maggasaccaṃ siyā savitakkasavicāraṃ, siyā avitakkavicāramattaṃ, siyā avitakkaavicāraṃ.
vb18:307.4: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā savitakkasavicāraṃ, siyā avitakkavicāramattaṃ, siyā avitakkaavicāraṃ, siyā na vattabbaṃ “savitakkasavicāran”tipi, “avitakkavicāramattan”tipi, “avitakkaavicāran”tipi. #4
vb18:308.4: Ekādasindriyā siyā savitakkasavicārā, siyā avitakkavicāramattā, siyā avitakkaavicārā. #5
vb18:309.2: Cha hetū siyā savitakkasavicārā, siyā avitakkavicāramattā, siyā avitakkaavicārā.
vb18:309.4: Tayo āhārā siyā savitakkasavicārā, siyā avitakkavicāramattā, siyā avitakkaavicārā.
vb18:309.7: Manoviññāṇadhātusamphasso siyā savitakkasavicāro, siyā avitakkavicāramatto, siyā avitakkaavicāro.
vb18:309.14: pañca cittā avitakkaavicārā manodhātu savitakkasavicārā, manoviññāṇadhātu siyā savitakkasavicārā, siyā avitakkavicāramattā, siyā avitakkaavicārā. #6–12
vb18:311.1: Pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ kati rūpā, kati arūpā … pe … sattannaṃ cittānaṃ kati rūpā, kati arūpā?
vb18:314.1: Pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ kati lokiyā, kati lokuttarā?
vb18:314.2: Dvādasannaṃ āyatanānaṃ kati lokiyā, kati lokuttarā?
vb18:314.3: Aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ kati lokiyā, kati lokuttarā?
vb18:314.4: Catunnaṃ saccānaṃ kati lokiyā, kati lokuttarā … pe … sattannaṃ cittānaṃ kati lokiyā, kati lokuttarā?
vb18:315.2: Cattāro khandhā siyā lokiyā, siyā lokuttarā.
vb18:315.4: Dve āyatanā siyā lokiyā, siyā lokuttarā.
vb18:315.6: Dve dhātuyo siyā lokiyā, siyā lokuttarā.
vb18:316.5: Cha hetū siyā lokiyā, siyā lokuttarā.
vb18:316.7: Tayo āhārā siyā lokiyā, siyā lokuttarā.
vb18:316.11: Manoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā vedanā siyā lokiyā, siyā lokuttarā.
vb18:316.13: Manoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā saññā siyā lokiyā, siyā lokuttarā.
vb18:316.15: Manoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā cetanā siyā lokiyā, siyā lokuttarā.
